flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Secondary arms act as part of the support structure for machines like the CEB Press.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Secondary arms act as part of the support structure for machines like the CEB Press.

Relevant parts
  • Angle steel pieces
  • Steel Piece
  • OSE leg holders
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • Cutting Torch
  • Welder

parts.notes: Weld your leg holders before beginning.

lines.text: Punch 2 holes in each arm on the 6" side of the angle. They are symmetrical.
lines.text_raw: Punch 2 holes in each arm on the 6" side of the angle. They are symmetrical.

lines.text: Place the 4 leg holders as shown in the diagram.
lines.text_raw: Place the 4 [guide|1704|leg holders] as shown in the diagram.

lines.text: They go on the 4" side of the angle
lines.text_raw: They go on the 4" side of the angle

lines.text: Make sure they are square with the angle iron and centered vertically.
lines.text_raw: Make sure they are square with the angle iron and centered vertically.

lines.text: Repeat to make the 2nd, mirror-image arm.
lines.text_raw: Repeat to make the 2nd, mirror-image arm.

guide.summary: Secondary arms connect the primary arms/frame assembly to the legs that support the structure.
guide.title: CEB: Secondary Arms
